description: Artificial Intelligence involves machine learning and deep learning to simulate human intelligence processes.
A decentralized ledger technology used for secure and transparent transactions, often in cryptocurrencies.
Virtual Reality creates immersive digital environments using headsets for gaming, training, and simulations.
Augmented Reality overlays digital information on the real world, enhancing user experiences in various applications.
Refers to large and complex data sets analyzed for insights, often using AI and machine learning.
Protects systems, networks, and data from digital attacks, theft, and damage, critical for digital security.
